title: Stuffing Balls
directions: Break bread into cube sized pieces, let dry overnight. Melt the butter in a large skillet, add celery and onion, sauteâ€™ until tender. Pour butter, celery & onion over bread crumbs. Add egg/milk mixture. Add enough turkey broth to hold bread together, not sticky. Shape bread into balls and bake at 350 degrees until browned about 30 minutes.
ingredients: add milk to egg to measure 1 cup
